channel.title: Media-Server on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Media-Server on Arrans github.io

item.title: AlexxIT/go2rtc
item.description: Ultimate camera streaming application with support RTSP, RTMP, HTTP-FLV, WebRTC, MSE, HLS, MP4, MJPEG, HomeKit, FFmpeg, etc.

item.title: Kareadita/Kavita
item.description: Kavita is a fast, feature rich, cross platform reading server. Built with the goal of being a full solution for all your reading needs. Setup your own server and share your reading collection with your friends and family.

item.title: bluenviron/mediamtx
item.description: Ready-to-use SRT / WebRTC / RTSP / RTMP / LL-HLS / MPEG-TS / RTP media server and media proxy that allows to read, publish, proxy, record and playback video and audio streams.
